body: Damn bifidus, we really need your incest h-manga translated..

Married woman named Maki teaches at her son Takeshi's school. She gave birth to him when she was young, thinking it would make raising him and returning to employment easier. Other students don't know they are related. The other male students talk about how much they wanna fuck her. Hearing them causes Takeshi to want her. One night, she sees his erection and decides to teach him how to masturbate, thinking it would help him. He rapes her. They regularly have raw sex afterwards. She avoids being impregnated due to not ovulating. Her ovulation day comes and she's horny during class. She sees Takeshi's erection during class. She tells him to see her after class. She tries to convince him that she just wants to have sex with him to calm him down, but she realizes she actually wants it herself and begs him to fuck her. He ends up cumming inside, most likely impregnating her. As they have more sex, the other students talk about how envious they are of Takeshi for being alone with Maki.
